recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Fry pancetta in olive oil until crispy.
Whisk eggs with grated Parmesan cheese in a bowl.
Drain spaghetti and mix immediately with the pancetta.
Remove from heat, and stir in the egg and cheese mixture.
Season with salt and black pepper before serving.

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Dice the chicken into bite-sized pieces.
Chop onion, garlic, and ginger finely.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté the onion, garlic, and ginger until fragrant.
Add curry powder and stir for a minute.
Add chicken pieces and cook until lightly browned.
Stir in tomato paste and coconut milk, and simmer for 20 minutes.
Season with salt and garnish with cilantro before serving.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Mix cornstarch with water to create a slurry.
Heat sesame oil in a wok and sauté garlic and ginger until fragrant.
Add vegetables and stir-fry on high heat for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and cornstarch slurry, and cook until sauce thickens.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Brown ground beef in a skillet and drain excess fat.
Add diced onion, minced garlic, and taco seasoning to the beef.
Chop tomatoes and lettuce for toppings.
Warm taco shells in the oven.
Assemble tacos with beef, cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and sour cream.

recipes.name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
Whisk milk, egg, and melted butter in a separate bowl.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until smooth.
Cook pancakes on a greased griddle over medium heat until bubbles form.
Flip and cook the other side until golden brown.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella.
Layer tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil on a plate.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

recipes.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter one side of each bread slice.
Place cheese between two bread slices with the buttered sides facing out.
Cook in a skillet over medium heat until golden brown on both sides.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Chop lettuce and place in a bowl.
Add croutons and Parmesan cheese.
Drizzle Caesar dressing over the salad and toss to combine.

recipes.name: French Toast
instructions: Whisk eggs, milk, sugar, and cinnamon in a bowl.
Dip bread slices into the mixture, coating both sides.
Cook on a greased skillet over medium heat until golden brown.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Cream together butter, brown sugar, and white sugar.
Add eggs and vanilla extract and mix well.
Combine flour, baking soda, and salt in a separate bowl.
Gradually add dry ingredients to the wet mixture.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Scoop onto a baking sheet and bake at 180°C (350°F) for 10-12 minutes.
